entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
